title: 微信分享后地址发生改变，根据地址获取get传递参数
不借助临时变量，进行两个整数的交换
student_answer:
<script language="javascript">
function swap(a,b){
var temp = new Array(2);
temp[0]=b;
temp[1]=a;
return temp;
}
var x=2;
var y=4;
var c = swap(x,y);
document.write(c[0],c[1]);
</script>

title: 进行两个整数的交换输入 a = 2, b = 4 输出 a = 4, b =2
student_answer:
<script language="javascript">
function swap(a,b){
var temp = new Array(2);
temp[0]=b;
temp[1]=a;
return temp;
}
var x=2;
var y=4;
var c = swap(x,y);
document.write(c[0],c[1]);
</script>
